trans-unit.source: Represents the style properties for an element of a control that renders as a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow" /> or <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示呈現為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 的控制項項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class represents the style properties for an element of a control that renders as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>類別代表的項目轉譯為控制項的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>。

trans-unit.source: You can control the vertical and horizontal alignment of the contents in an item of the table by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.HorizontalAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.VerticalAlign%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定來控制資料表的項目中內容的垂直和水平對齊方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.HorizontalAlign%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.VerticalAlign%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify whether the contents of the cell automatically continue on the next line when the end of the cell is reached by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.Wrap%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定是否儲存格的內容會自動繼續在下一行藉由設定達到資料格的結束時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.Wrap%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class provides methods that are useful for creating a style for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別提供方法，可用於建立樣式中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.CopyFrom%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.MergeWith%2A> methods to copy or merge the style properties of another <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> with the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> that the method is called from.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.CopyFrom%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.MergeWith%2A>方法來複製或合併的樣式屬性，另一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>與執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>從呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates several rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control and applies a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object to each row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立數個資料列中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制，並套用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>每個資料列的物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值，建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> that represents the state bag in which to store style information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" />，表示儲存樣式資訊的狀態包。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> class with the specified state bag.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的狀態包，建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class using the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>類別使用指定<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The output stream that renders HTML content to the client.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTML 內容呈現給用戶端的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: The control that the style refers to.
trans-unit.target: 樣式參考的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Adds information about horizontal alignment, vertical alignment, and wrap to the list of attributes to render.
trans-unit.target: 將水平對齊、垂直對齊和換行的相關資訊加入要呈現的屬性清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method is used primarily by control developers to insert additional attributes and styles in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.AddAttributesToRender%2A>方法由控制項開發人員主要是用來插入其他屬性和樣式中<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>的輸出資料流<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.AddAttributesToRender%2A>方法覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.AddAttributesToRender%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that represents the style to copy.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，表示要複製的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Duplicates the non-empty style properties of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> into the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> class that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的非空白樣式屬性，複製至呼叫這個方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.CopyFrom%2A> method to duplicate the non-empty style properties of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> into the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.CopyFrom%2A>複製指定的非空白的樣式屬性的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>轉換的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>從呼叫這個方法的類別。

trans-unit.source: All properties in the current instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class are replaced by the associated property in the `s` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體中的所有屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>中相關聯的屬性會取代類別`s`參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the contents in a cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格中內容的水平對齊。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.HorizontalAlign%2A> property to specify the horizontal alignment of the data list control within its container.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.HorizontalAlign%2A>屬性來指定資料清單控制項，其容器內的水平對齊。

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設為其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The horizontal alignment is not set.
trans-unit.target: 水平對齊未設定。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a cell are left justified within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的內容靠左對齊的資料格內。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a cell are centered within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的內容會置中與資料格內。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a cell are right justified within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的內容靠右對齊資料格內。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The specified horizontal alignment is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的水平對齊不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that represents the style to combine.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，表示要合併的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Combines the style properties of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> into the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> class that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的樣式屬性與呼叫這個方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 類別的執行個體組合在一起。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.MergeWith%2A> method to combine the style properties of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> into the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class that this method is called from.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.MergeWith%2A>方法，將指定的樣式屬性合併<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>轉換的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>從呼叫這個方法的類別。

trans-unit.source: This method joins the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object and the current instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法加入的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>物件和目前的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>類別。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by setting each property that is not set in the current instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class with the value in the corresponding property of the `s` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這透過設定每個屬性的目前執行個體中未設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>類別中的對應屬性的值與`s`參數。

trans-unit.source: Only properties that have not been set are replaced.
trans-unit.target: 尚未設定的屬性會被取代。

trans-unit.source: If a property in the `s` parameter is not set, it does not replace the corresponding property in the current instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的屬性`s`未設定參數，不會取代目前的執行個體中的對應屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>類別。

trans-unit.source: Removes any defined style elements from the style.
trans-unit.target: 將所有已定義樣式項目從樣式中移除。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove any defined style elements from the style, leaving the style in its default configuration.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的樣式，並將樣式保留其預設組態中的任何已定義的樣式項目中使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the contents in a cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格中內容的垂直對齊。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.VerticalAlign" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.VerticalAlign" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.VerticalAlign%2A> property to specify the vertical alignment of the contents of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.VerticalAlign%2A>屬性，以指定的儲存格內容的垂直對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: Vertical Alignment
trans-unit.target: 垂直對齊方式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The vertical alignment is not set.
trans-unit.target: 未設定的垂直對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the cell are aligned with the upper edge of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的上邊緣會對齊的資料格的內容。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the cell are aligned with the center of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格的內容會儲存格中央對齊。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the cell are aligned with the lower edge of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 資料格的下邊緣會對齊的資料格的內容。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The specified vertical alignment was not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.VerticalAlign" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的垂直對齊不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.VerticalAlign" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contents of a cell wrap in the cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出儲存格內容是否在儲存格中換行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the contents of the cell wrap in the cell; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果儲存格內容在儲存格中換行，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.Wrap%2A> property to specify or determine whether the contents of the cell wrap.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle.Wrap%2A>屬性來指定或決定是否要換行的資料格的內容。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。
